alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 12:45PM CST until March 03 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Lowland near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 13.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 10.7 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
